content:
leanprover/lean4#7672 makes many changes to the implicitness of arguments in the List/Array/Vector APIs. Mostly the consequences in Mathlib are positive: we get to remove many _s!

However at times we now need named arguments.

In cases where we are writing "uphill" by a lemma, I don't so much mind the extra notation of named arguments.

However if reviewers see things here where they would prefer to just have an explicit argument, please let me know. Even if leanprover/lean4#7672 is already in I'm happy to revert some of the changes.
